title: Buzzing City Escape in the Heart of the Action
description: Immerse yourself in the colonial-era charm and buzzing nightlife of Kolkata with a five-star escape to Swissotel Kolkata. India’s former capital and an intellectual hub located just moments from the buzzing New Town city centre and the closest five-star hotel to the airport, enjoy a two-night staycation with daily breakfast, a complimentary dinner for two featuring authentic Bengali cuisine and world dishes with nightly cocktails.
offer_address: City Centre New Town, Action Area 2 D Plot No 11 5, Kolkata, West Bengal 700157

title: Contemporary Kolkata Stay near Airport
description: Whether you're making a stop in your travels or settling in for a grand adventure, Kolkata’s stunning landmarks are just a hop, skip and jump from your base at Holiday Inn Express Kolkata Airport, an IHG Hotel. Marvel at the impressive Howrah Bridge before visiting great works of art and literature at the stunningly crafted Victoria Memorial, feast on tasty phuchka and sip on a hot chai at James Hickey Sarani, or pick a team and venture down to Eden Gardens for an exciting game of cricket.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Kolkata Airport, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 28 Jessore Road Nscbi, Airport, Dum Dum, Kolkata, West Bengal 700052, India

title: Majestic Oberoi Kolkata Stay with Stunning Pool, Tranquil Spa & Onsite Dining
description: Experience the grandeur of India with a luxurious stay at this iconic Kolkata abode, fondly known as the 'Grand Dame of Chowringhee'. Snuggled in the heart of the city, the century-old heritage hotel offers a blend of classic architecture and contemporary elegance. Savour authentic Bengali and world cuisines at threesixtythree° and indulge in a Thai culinary experience at Baan Thai. Take a dip in the pool or destress with treatments at the spa - the choice is yours.
offer_address: 15 Jawaharlal Nehru Road, Kolkata, West Bengal 700013, India

title: Kolkata Escape with Outdoor Swimming Pool
description: Immerse yourself in the whirlwind energy of Kolkata when you stay at Holiday Inn Kolkata Airport, a modern gem located within close proximity to the city's popular sights. Stay a stone's throw from Eco Park, New Town Coffee House and Mother's Wax Museum, returning to your hotel between expeditions to cool off in the refreshing outdoor swimming pool. When hunger strikes, Social Kitchen serves everything from authentic Indian cuisine to European delights.
location_description: Holiday Inn Kolkata Airport, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Biswa Bangla Sarani, Rajarhat, Kolkata, 700136 India
